title: 7 Bedroomed House on 19 perches in NUGEGODA
details:
NUGEGODA – Delkanda. Owner built (not built for Sale!) solid 2 Storey house on 19 Perches facing a wide Access Road. 200M to High Level Road.

Upper Floor can be also used separately. Foundation & Construction has been done to add another Floor if needed!

4500 sq ft, 7 Bedrooms, 5 Bathrooms, Worker’s Room & Toilet.

Parking for 5 Vehicles within the property. Dual Road Frontage!

No Brokers. 0772280690
